participant_1.background:
I have to wear a beanie to play soccer in the cold weather, but I still love it.
my favorite rapper is yo gotti.
I am determined to overcome my fears and achieve my goals.
my husband is a soldier in the us army.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.

participant_2.background:
I'm worried that my parents will find out about my deployment.
i have a consulting firm.
I love to eat at the local diner because it is close to my house and the food is always good.
I am of a healthy weight for my height.
I have started baking for my family and friends.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
Hello, I'm doing well, thank you. How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you. I'm a little nervous because my husband is a soldier in the US Army and he's about to be deployed.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I know how you feel, my husband is also in the Army and he's been deployed a few times. It can be really tough.
It is, but I know he's doing important work. I just hope he comes home safe.
I'm sure he will. He's a strong and brave man.
I know, he is. Thank you for the reassurance.
You're welcome. What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I'm also a writer. I love to write short stories and poems.
That's great! I'm a consultant, and I also love to bake.
Baking is so much fun! I love making bread and cakes.
Me too! I love sharing my baked goods with my family and friends.
That's awesome. I'm sure they love them.
Thanks. How about you, do you have any hobbies?
I love to play soccer, but I have to wear a beanie to play in the cold weather because I don't see colors very well.
That's interesting. I've never heard of that before.
It's not a big deal, I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
That's good to know. I'm glad you don't let your vision impairment hold you back from doing the things you love.
Thank you, I try not to.
That's the spirit!
